QuestData.Title: Encroaching Storm
QuestData.Description: The villagers have lost another yak this morning to one of the thundermaw wolves from across the river. The wolves grow bold.$B$BThis is a sign that they are breeding beyond the vale's ability to sustain them. It's time to thin their numbers again.$B$BIf you are willing to aid me in this, you would have my sincere appreciation.
